Although the performance of the intensity-based luminescent thermometer, which take
emission, are very promising, the reliability of accurate temperature
readout is limited due to the fact that emission intensity of a single band may be affected by the
number of experimental and physical parameters. Therefore, most of the studies concern the
bandshape luminescent thermometer, for which relative emission intensity of two bands is used for
temperature sensing. Taking advantage of the fact that emission intensities of V
